sentences.sContent: The mongrel presented his muzzle for scratching.
sentences.sCn: 这只杂种狗探出口鼻挠痒。

synos.tran: 枪口，炮口；口套，口络；动物的鼻口

phrases.pCn: 炮口制退器；枪口制退器

words.tran: 迎面强风；强逆风；带着口套的动物

trans.tranCn: 枪口，炮口；口套，口络；动物的鼻口
trans.tranOther: a cover that you put over a dog’s mouth to stop it from biting people

trans.tranCn: 使…缄默；给…戴口套；封锁…的言论
trans.tranOther: to prevent someone from saying what they think in public
